notes.content:
Hi there,
It is my husbands birthday & we would like to celebrate it there. 
Thanks,
Samira
Guest requested the following Accommodation Features while making their Online Booking: Bathroom

Will be coming with friends that will be booking a caravan site, if possible to book them close to us. Last name the Cooks 

Thank you!
Travelling with the Baileys who are staying in a cabin. If we could be close together that would be amazing please!
Looking forward to beautiful riverviews. We have 4wd with 360 awning and 2 swags.

Motorhome is 2.4m wide with a 600m slide out. 
Please allocate a grass site as we have a 2m x 4m inflatable dog fence which needs to be hammered into the ground for the set up. We\'re happy to put the motorhome onto a slab if that is allowed.
I couldn\'t work out how to put in a date for the dinner, which would obviously be Wednesday 8th October.
Thanks for taking my call and I look forward to seeing you Monday. 
If 12.30 is too early to come in, please let me know when would suit you.

Will have 2 kids in swags on stretchers beside van. 
Interested in possible late checkout?
